entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as racing after Harper and trying to catch the Snitch.

entities.name: harper
entities.description: A Slytherin student who spots the Snitch before Harry. He is described as speeding off and being ahead of Harry in the chase.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: The flying instructor at Hogwarts. She is mentioned as having her back turned to the students during the Quidditch match.

entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: A student who uses a megaphone to commentate on the Quidditch match. He is described as saying that Harper has seen the Snitch and Harry hasn't.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts. It is mentioned as being represented by Harper.

relationships.description: Harry is chasing after Harper, who has spotted the Snitch before him.
Zacharias Smith is commentating on the Quidditch match and pointing out that Harry hasn't seen the Snitch.
